# connectReceiver(name:endpoint:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an [doc://com.apple.immersivemediasupport/documentation/ImmersiveMediaSupport/ImmersiveMediaRemotePreviewReceiver] to the sender as an active participant of the network preview. Any updates on the sender will be propagated to all active receivers (frames, camera information, static metadata).

## Declaration

```swift
func connectReceiver(name: String, endpoint: NWEndpoint) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **name**: The name associated with the receiver being connected.

## Discussion
title: connectReceiver(name:endpoint:)
